Room.Name: Wakeforest Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down Wakeforest Drive, east of the Shrine of Moradin.
Room.LongDescription: Moradin is the Creator of the Dwarven Race, and the dwarves worship him regularly as if the end of the world were going to come tomorrow. The fanatic worship of a god has inspired many wars and many victories for the dwarves, but now they live in relative peace with the humans and other races of the world (although they still don't really like the elves too much.) On the east is the Oceancrest Orphanage.
